goal.en: 介紹電子商務重要技術“資料探勘”，並透過軟體Weka的練習，以體會該技術的價值。
goal.ch: 介紹電子商務重要技術“資料探勘”，並透過軟體Weka的練習，以體會該技術的價值。

content.en:
“ What’s It All About?
 Input: Concepts, Instances, and Attributes
 Output: Knowledge Representation
 Algorithms: The Basic Methods
 Credibility: Evaluating What’s Been Learned
 Implementations: Real Machine Learning Schemes
 Data Transformations
 Ensemble Learning
 Moving on: Applications and Beyond
content.ch:
“ What’s It All About?
 Input: Concepts, Instances, and Attributes
 Output: Knowledge Representation
 Algorithms: The Basic Methods
 Credibility: Evaluating What’s Been Learned
 Implementations: Real Machine Learning Schemes
 Data Transformations
 Ensemble Learning
 Moving on: Applications and Beyond“

textbook.en: “1. Witten, Ian H., Eibe Frank and Mark A. Hall: Data Mining: Practical Machine Learning Tools and Techniques. 3rd Edition, Morgan Kaufmann, 2011. 新月東華教科書 2. Han, Jiawei, Micheline Kamber and Jian Pei: Data Mining: Concepts and Techniques. 3rd Edition, Morgan Kaufmann, 2012. 新月東華. 參考書 3. Roiger, Richard and Michael Geatz: Data Mining—A Tutorial-Based Primer. Addison Wesley, 2003. 新月東華 參考書“
textbook.ch: “1. Witten, Ian H., Eibe Frank and Mark A. Hall: Data Mining: Practical Machine Learning Tools and Techniques. 3rd Edition, Morgan Kaufmann, 2011. 新月東華教科書 2. Han, Jiawei, Micheline Kamber and Jian Pei: Data Mining: Concepts and Techniques. 3rd Edition, Morgan Kaufmann, 2012. 新月東華. 參考書 3. Roiger, Richard and Michael Geatz: Data Mining—A Tutorial-Based Primer. Addison Wesley, 2003. 新月東華 參考書“

domain.en: 商業智慧 、 資料管理 、 電子商務管理

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試

en: Department:Master of Information Management、PhD in Information Management only.
